Good Comments: New hope for Meitantei CONAN fansub. Nice RAWs, both hardsub and softsub releases, not ideal, but very good translation, nice scripts. After DCTP quit, this guys is the only ones who works on series like this.

Great translations so far
 its a bit slow on the releases but the quality makes up for that
hopefully they become more popular and will get more translators soon
Bad Comments: Much better after a while when they got two editors.

Good Comments: Very good subs. The only fansub group that subs Detective Conan and Magic kaito
